name: DeleteCustomerCustomAttribute
description:
Deletes a custom attribute from a customer profile.

Use this tool to delete a custom attribute associated with a customer profile. Applicable when removing attributes with visibility set to READ_WRITE.

parameters.name: customer_profile_id
parameters.description: The ID of the target customer profile for which the custom attribute will be deleted.

value_schema.description: The ID of the target [customer profile](entity:Customer).

parameters.name: custom_attribute_key
parameters.description: The key of the custom attribute to delete. Must match the key of a custom attribute definition in the Square seller account. Use the qualified key if not the definition owner.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The ID of the target [customer profile](entity:Customer).

value_schema.description: The ID of the target [customer profile](entity:Customer).

parameters.name: key
parameters.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

value_schema.description:
The key of the custom attribute to delete. This key must match the `key` of a custom
attribute definition in the Square seller account. If the requesting application is not the
definition owner, you must use the qualified key.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
